about_the_game:
Assassin class for Shades Of Rayna.

Assassin is a class in the game and uses blade and knife and just like other classes, has 10 active and 5 passive skills.

Actives:
Barrage - Throw a bunch of knives on mouse location
Sting - Thrust your blade into the enemy. If the blade hits, it spills blood when pulled out, dealing area damage
Throatcut - Swing your blade to cut through multiple enemies
Flash - Ride the lightning through the mouse location
Scorch - Teleport to mouse location dealing area damage
Toxife - Throw 3 toxic knives on short distance
Deadly Strike - Charge your sword, then slice the enemies in front of you and create a blood explosion
Aqublast - Throw series of aquatic knives in a line through mouse location
Shadowfall - Disappear into the air, then launch to mouse location from above dealing area damage
Massacre - Swing your sword repeatedly, cutting everything in front of you

Passives:
Twin Strike - Every 10th basic attack deals double damage
Steal - Your basic attacks steal 2% of your max health amount of life to your health
Second Chance - When your health reach 0, you resurrect with %50 health (Triggers once in a map)
Illusive Drain - With 25% chance, upcoming attack does not deal damage to you but heal 5% of your max health
Hemorrhage - Every basic attack hit piles the blood up in the enemy and at certain point explode in itself

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
